ctx: have: n \in nodes by apply: client_nodes H.
exceptions.exn: In environment server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \ otin clients Huniq : uniq clients n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : LockCoh d H : n \\in clients s : dynamic id Hf : find st (getLocal n d) = Some s _view_subject_ : n \\in nodes The term "n" has type "Equality.sort nat_eqType" while it is expected to have type "LockCoh ?d".

original: move=> Hf. have: n \in nodes by apply: client_nodes H. move=> /(getLocal_coh n d C) [Hvl Hn]. case: ifP => [/eqP|] Heq. - move: (client_not_server n H) => /negP []. by apply: eqP. - move: Hn. rewrite (negbTE Heq). move=> [_ [cs Hget]]. rewrite Hget in Hf. inversion Hf. subst. by [].
